procurementMethodName.title: Procurement method name
procurementMethodName.description: The name of the method is more specific than `procurementMethod`. See README.md for guidance.

acceleratedProcedure.title: Accelerated procedure
acceleratedProcedure.description: Whether or not the delay for tenderers to bid is shorter than the usual legal delay.

acceleratedProcedureRationale.title: Accelerated procedure rationale
acceleratedProcedureRationale.description: The rationale for choosing to proceed with an accelerated procedure.

stagedProcedure.title: Staged procedure
stagedProcedure.description: The procedure will take place in successive stages. In each stage, some participants may be eliminated.

possiblyNoNegotiation.title: Possibly no negotiation
possiblyNoNegotiation.description: TThe procuring entity reserves the right to award the contract on the basis of the initial bids without any further negotiations.

bidOpeningPlace.title: Bid opening place
bidOpeningPlace.description: The address or location of the place where the bids will be pulicly opened.

bidOpeningProcedure.title: Bid opening procedure
bidOpeningProcedure.description: The procedure to open the bids and the information about the people authorised to attend.

recurrentProcurement.title: Recurrent procurement
recurrentProcurement.description: Whether or not the purchased items are likely to be purchased again in the foreseeable future. This doesn't include framework agreements or dynamic purchasing systems, in which recurrence is implied.

recurrentProcurementDetails.title: Recurrent procurement details
recurrentProcurementDetails.description: Details about the recurrence of the procedure, such as timings.

invitationsForInterestDispatchDate.title: Invitation for interest dispath date
invitationsForInterestDispatchDate.description: The estimated date of dispatch of the invitations to confirm interest.

invitationsForBidsDispatchDate.title: Invitation for bids dispath date
invitationsForBidsDispatchDate.description: The estimated date of dispatch of the invitations to submit bids in two (or more) stage procedures.
